item.description: A FUNDRAISER TO Benefit The BBS. Hope you can make it out and support the Blues society of Boston, greaat line-up check this out on BBS website for detaisls. www.bostonbluessociety.org.
item.why: There is a lot going on in May with the Regal Queen of the blues as a part of the happenings around the area. Look forward to seeing you at some or all of these events.
item.name: 05-07-11 Shirley Lewis & Boston Blues Society meet up with Boston Millionaires
